rounds.comments: (Alex: This is an unusual category in that each correct response in this category will be a word whose letters can be found in the word "beginning".  So look at it quickly now and start figuring all the words you can make with those letters.)

clues.text: In the familiar cliche, it precedes "borrow or steal"

Family name of Spanish composer Joaquin & his writer daughter Anais

After the "Night Watch", his popularity as a painter declined, causing financial hardship

His "Garden of Earthly Delights" hangs in the Prado in Madrid

After Leander drowned, she killed herself in grief
Ironically, few people even lost their footing when this ship hit the iceberg

To dispose of or postpone an item of business in parliamentary procedure
Static scenes of 3-dimensional figures, the annual Laguna Arts Festival features them "vivant"

clues.response: the Reagans (the president & the first lady)

clues.text: w/circulation of about 20 million each, these 2 pocket-size periodicals are the biggest in U.S.

clues.response: Damn the torpedoes, full speed ahead

rounds.text: Before his death in 2005, he said he was "probably the last head of state to be able to recognize all his compatriots in the street"
